Name: Lesbos
Description: The largest island in the North Aegean, known for its ancient ruins and beautiful beaches.

Name: Chios
Description: An island famous for its medieval villages, mastic production, and unique architecture.

Name: Samos
Description: An island known for its ancient history, including the Temple of Hera, and its lush vineyards.

Name: Ikaria
Description: An island famous for the longevity of its residents and its rugged, mountainous terrain.

Name: Lemnos
Description: An island known for its pristine beaches, ancient ruins, and agricultural products like olive oil.

Name: Mount Athos
Description: An autonomous monastic state on a peninsula, home to numerous ancient monasteries and a UNESCO World Heritage site.
